Key Match Events: Edward Cabrera pitched seven scoreless innings
Miami Marlins beat the Philadelphia Phillies 10-1
Pre-Game Insights: Marlins manager Skip Schumaker emphasized the importance of taking each game day by day
Post-Match Reflections: Phillies manager Rob Thomson noted that Seth Johnson pitched up in the hitting zone and might have been nervous
Connor Norby said that jumping on the Phillies early helped the Marlins
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Marlins had their 69th player appear in a game this season and tied a major league record
Seth Johnson made his major league debut and allowed nine runs and eight hits in 2 1/3 innings
Others: The Phillies placed INF Edmundo Sosa on the 10-day injured list
LHP Ryan Weathers gave up four runs and six hits over 2 2/3 innings in a rehab outing with Triple-A Jacksonville
